turbine.condition: Reach the end of the Turbine Facility

shiny_crystal.name: Shiny Crystal
shiny_crystal.condition: Reach the island at the end of Stellar Lake in the Crystal Caves

dessert_house.name: Dessert House
dessert_house.description: It's just a nice little house
dessert_house.condition: Enter Trixie's house in Galleta World

eye_flower.name: Eye Flower
eye_flower.condition: Use the Seer effect near a certain flower in Alien Plants World to make it bud

arcade.name: Bright Arcade
arcade.condition: View all the active arcade machines in the Concrete Treehouse

paper_boat.name: Paper Boat
paper_boat.condition: Ride the paper boat at Lantern Lake

hermit_crab.name: Hermit Crab
hermit_crab.condition: Get a hermit crab from a vending machine

lotus_cluster.name: Lotus Cluster
lotus_cluster.description: A happy and relaxing time in the water

fried_soap_bars.name: FRIED SOAP BARS
fried_soap_bars.condition: Interact with the TV in Tanuki Forest while wearing the Duckling Dress

labyrinth_boombox.name: The Labyrinth Shuffle
labyrinth_boombox.condition: Activate the boombox in the Grasslands Labyrinth

shrine_garden.name: Resting Place; White Flowers
shrine_garden.condition: Trigger the event in the Spirit Shrines

vista.name: Viva La Vista
vista.description: Enjoying the view at all times
vista.condition: Walk onto the balcony during each state (morning, day, evening, night, storm)

calendar.name: Four Seasons
calendar.condition: See the Nexus in all 4 seasons

epacse.name: SUDOXE
epacse.condition: Visit the EPACSE Launch Islands and dock your boat at one of the piers

guitar.name: Hair Metal
guitar.condition: Find and play the guitar in Danae's Bad Hair Day

rainbow_screw.name: One of Us! One of Us!
rainbow_screw.condition: Use the Screw key to screw into the ground at the Rainbow Screw Floor
